question: Which of the following was a contemporary of the Saiyid Sultans of Delhi?
option4: Yahya Bin Ahmed Bin Abdullah Sarhindi
answer: Yahya Bin Ahmed Bin Abdullah Sarhindi
explanation: Yahya Bin Ahmed Bin Abdullah Sarhindi had collected historical information from various other sources for his book Tarikh-i-Mubarakshahi after the death of Saiyid Sultan Mubarak Shah about the middle of the fifteenth century.
